__e: As you can see, the evil within you won't allow it.

Some of you may be thinking, "well that's very nice, but I can't do that", or "she won't let me do that", or "he'll never let me do that", or "I haven't got enough money to do that", or "I'm not strong enough to do that", or "I'm not rich enough to do that", or "I'm not..."

Some of you may be thinking, "well that's very nice, but I can't do that", or "she won't let me do that", or "he'll never let me do that", or "I haven't got enough money to do that", or "I'm not strong enough to do that", or "I'm not rich enough to do that", or "I'm not..."
I do know that... with the sympathy of one living being... I would make peace with all.
Wants for you. - The money'll let me do the things
Working in a simpler, safer way will allow you to step back from the edge?
Right now it might be causing you pain, but I promise you, it will let you feel something else soon enough.
We've been here for 400 years and now he tells us that maybe in 40 years, if you're good, we may let you become president.
Um, something that would allow you to walk out of here and out of my life for good. Fine.
Maybe you're right that no court will allow my suit to go forward, but you could've told me that on the phone.
A dagger to her heart will drive out my sister and allow your friend to reclaim her body.
I know that sounds like a long time, but what you are about to do means this town's survival.
I'm sorry, but we'll never let that happen.
His father won't allow such a girl in his office.
We all know your failed father ran this hotel into the ground, and thankfully, you will not get the chance to make the same mistake all over again.
